Up Up Down Down

The podcast that takes a critical look at the craft of making games. Developers Allen Pike and Nigel Brooke dig in to a new topic each episode with an interesting guest.

Up Up Down Down is currently on hiatus, though we have at least two more episodes coming. Eventually.

16. The Looney Tunes School of Stealth

Justin Voss of Low Earth Orbit joins us to talk stealth games. We discuss the origin of stealth games, instant failure, and the joy of finding alternative ways to complete a mission. Then, we rag on Metal Gear Solid and salivate over E3 announcements.

  • The original Thief
  • Eavesdropping in Assassin’s Creed
  • Splinter Cell
  • Outposts in Far Cry 3
  • Deus Ex: Human Revolution
  • Metal Gear Solid 3’s River of Sorrow and The End
  • Polygon’s Best of E3
  • Alien: Isolation Preview
  • Bungie’s Destiny on previous-gen and current-gen consoles
  • Greatest box office bombs of all time
